AT.name: Disney Art Academy™
AT.description: Lerne in Disney Art Academy, wie du die verschiedensten Disney- und Pixar-Figuren zeichnest! Nutze eine breite Palette an Werkzeugen, um mehr als 80 Disney- und Pixar-Charaktere auf die virtuelle Leinwand zu bannen. Bestimme selbst, in welcher Reihenfolge du die vielfältigen, leicht verständlichen Lektionen absolvieren möchtest und welche Helden du auf den Bildschirm zaubern möchtest: ob Micky Maus, Nemo aus Findet Nemo, Elsa aus Die Eiskönigin - Völlig unverfroren, Buzz Lightyear aus Toy Story oder Simba aus König der Löwen!

AU.name: Disney Art Academy™
AU.description: Learn to draw dozens of Disney and Pixar Characters in Disney Art Academy! You can use a wide variety of tools to learn to draw more than 80 Disney and Pixar characters in 2D. By setting your own pace through multiple easy-to-follow lessons, characters like Mickey Mouse, Nemo from Finding Nemo, Elsa from Frozen, Buzz Lightyear from Toy Story and Simba from The Lion King come to life on your Nintendo 3DS!

BG.name: Disney Art Academy™
BG.description: Learn to draw dozens of Disney and Pixar Characters in Disney Art Academy! You can use a wide variety of tools to learn to draw more than 80 Disney and Pixar characters in 2D. By setting your own pace through multiple easy-to-follow lessons, characters like Mickey Mouse, Nemo from Finding Nemo, Elsa from Frozen, Buzz Lightyear from Toy Story and Simba from The Lion King come to life on your Nintendo 3DS!

BE.name: Disney Art Academy™
BE.description: Apprenez à dessiner des douzaines de personnages Disney et Pixar dans Disney Art Academy ! Vous pouvez utiliser toute une panoplie d'outils pour apprendre à dessiner plus de 80 personnages Disney et Pixar en 2D. Grâce à des leçons simples que vous pourrez suivre à votre rythme, des personnages comme Mickey, Nemo, Elsa de la Reine des neiges, Buzz l'Éclair de Toy Story ou encore Simba du Roi lion prendront vie sur l'écran de votre console Nintendo 3DS.

ES.name: Disney Art Academy™
ES.description: Aprende a dibujar docenas de personajes de Disney y Pixar con Disney Art Academy! Podrás usar variedad de herramientas para aprender a dibujar más de 80 personajes de Disney y Pixar en 2D. Aprende a tu propio ritmo siguiendo múltiples y sencillas lecciones y verás cómo personajes de la talla de Mickey Mouse, Nemo de Buscando a Nemo, Elsa de Frozen, Buzz Lightyear de Toy Story o Simba de El rey león cobran vida en la pantalla de tu consola Nintendo 3DS en menos que canta un gallo.

IT.name: Disney Art Academy™
IT.description: Impara a disegnare più di 80 personaggi Disney e Pixar in 2D in Disney Art Academy! Esplora le varie lezioni seguendo il tuo ritmo per scoprire come fare prendere vita sul tuo Nintendo 3DS a personaggi come Topolino, Nemo di Alla Ricerca di Nemo, Elsa di Frozen, Buzz Lightyear di Toy Story e Simba de Il Re Leone!

NL.name: Disney Art Academy™
NL.description: Teken tientallen Disney- en Pixar-personages in Disney Art Academy! Gebruik allerlei hulpmiddelen om om meer dan 80 personages van Disney en Pixar in 2D te leren tekenen. Volg gemakkelijk te begrijpen lessen op je eigen tempo en zie hoe personages als Mickey Mouse, Nemo uit Finding Nemo, Elsa uit Frozen, Buzz Lightyear uit Toy Story en Simba uit De Leeuwenkoning tot leven komen op het scherm van je Nintendo 3DS.

NZ.name: Disney Art Academy™
NZ.description: Learn to draw dozens of Disney and Pixar Characters in Disney Art Academy! You can use a wide variety of tools to learn to draw more than 80 Disney and Pixar characters in 2D. By setting your own pace through multiple easy-to-follow lessons, characters like Mickey Mouse, Nemo from Finding Nemo, Elsa from Frozen, Buzz Lightyear from Toy Story and Simba from The Lion King come to life on your Nintendo 3DS!

By setting your own pace through multiple easy-to-follow lessons, characters like Mickey Mouse, Nemo from Finding Nemo, Elsa from Frozen, Buzz Lightyear from Toy Story and Simba from The Lion King come to life on your Nintendo 3DS!

PT.name: Disney Art Academy™
PT.description: Aprende a desenhar dezenas de personagens da Disney e da Pixar em Disney Art Academy! Podes usar uma grande variedade de ferramentas para aprender a desenhar as mais de 80 personagens da Disney e da Pixar em 2D. Segue ao teu próprio ritmo com aulas simples e dá vida na tua Nintendo 3DS a personagens tais como o Rato Mickey, o Nemo de "À Procura de Nemo", a Elsa de "Frozen - O Reino do Gelo", o Buzz Lightyear de "Toy Story" e o Simba de "O Rei Leão".

RU.name: Disney Art Academy™
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Учитесь рисовать персонажей студий Disney и Pixar в художественной академии Disney Art Academy! Вы сможете воспользоваться различными инструментами и нарисовать более 80 персонажей Disney и Pixar в 2D. Множество простых уроков позволят вам научиться рисовать Микки Мауса, Немо из «В поисках Немо», Эльзу из «Холодного сердца», Базза Лайтера из «Истории игрушек» и Симбу из «Короля Льва» на дисплее Nintendo 3DS!
